login_subtitle: Welcome back! Log in to access your account and continue managing and maintaining your car.
signin_terms_of_service: By Register in, you agree to the
terms_of_service: By logging in, you agree to the
create_account_subtitle: Start your journey with us to manage your car easily and effectively. Register your account now and enjoy alert services and detailed reports for your car maintenance.
otp_subtitle: Please enter the OTP sent to your phone number to verify your account.
onboarding_body_1: Your smart app for managing and maintaining your car in the best way. With iCar, you'll receive personalized alerts and reminders, and comprehensive reports for everything you need to know about your car's maintenance.
onboarding_body_2: iCar allows you to set alerts to remind you of important service appointments, such as oil changes, brake checks, and tire replacements, keeping your car always in top condition.
onboarding_body_3: You can view your car's maintenance history and updates anytime, thanks to the detailed reports we provide. Track changes easily and stay informed about everything related to your car.

loginSubTitle: Make it work, make it right, make it fast.

forgetPasswordSubTitle: Enter your email to reset your password.
forgetPhoneSubTitle: Enter your registered phone number to receive the verification code
forgetMailSubTitle: Enter your registered email to receive the verification code
emailVerificationSubTitle:
We just sent an email verification link to your email. Please check your email and click the link to verify your email address. 

 If you're not redirected automatically after verifying, click the continue button.
invalid_email_format: Please enter a valid email address.
short_password_error: Password is too short. It must be at least 8 characters.
long_password_error: Password is too long. It must be less than 30 characters.
phone_too_short: Phone number is too short. It must be at least 8 characters.
phone_too_long: Phone number is too long. It must be no longer than 15 characters.
invalid_name_format: Please enter a valid name with letters and spaces only.
invalid_username_format: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
short_username_error: Username is too short. It must be at least 3 characters.
long_username_error: Username is too long. It must be less than 10 characters.
invalid_cr_number_format: The CR number format is invalid.
